item.title: Rules
item.description: Participation is mandatory! (Exception: Production went down!) If you’re in Bangalore, come to office. You can participate solo/in a team of two. You have exactly 24 hours to build. Office will be open through the night. (Yes, we will stock up on Redbull) If you’re not in Bangalore, you can still participate. If a majority of your project is built before the hackathon, you maybe disqualified. There are no themes this time!
